RANDOMIMPACT.MASTERTRANSLATION: As a promotion one of your sponsors has offered your players free pay TV. This has boosted team morale.
The team has done a series of television commercials marketing upcoming games and has boosted team morale.
The team was met with a large gathering of adoring fans at the airport terminal which has boosted team morale.
The Commissioner has publicly praised the team for it's sportsmanship. This ahs provided a boost to team morale.
The team arranged a dinner gettogether to help clear the air and improve comaraderie which seems to have improved team morale.
Rumors have been circulating in the press that you are planning to take the team in a new direction and possible changes are in the works. Uncertainty has affected team morale.
Recent changes has much of the team on edge. As a result, team morale has taken a hit.
The team plane was delayed and they had to take red-eye flight last night leaving the team restless, their energy levels have suffered as a result.
A flu bug has been circulating among the team and it has resulted in a drop in their overall energy level.
Your player %1% is now a proud father of a newborn (and future hockey talent). His morale couldn't be better.
Your player %1% has tied the knot with his long-time girlfriend and his morale has improved.
Your player %1% received some praise from a newspaper columnist in the local newspaper and it has had a positive effect on his morale.
Your player %1% is celebrating a birthday today and has experienced a boost in his morale.
Your player %1% recently purchased a house in the area and feels confident about his future with the team.
Your player %1% was criticized by a newspaper columnist in the local newspaper today and it has had a negative effect on his morale.
Your player %1% had a scuffle with a teammate in practice today and his morale has dropped as a result.
Your player %1% has expressed doubts about his future with the team after reading a trade rumor in the local newspaper. It has also hurt his morale.
Your player %1% has experienced a death in the family and as a result his morale is low.
Your player %1% feels the team needs improving and has his doubts as to future team success as the team currently stands, these doubts have also effected his morale.
Your player %1% was hit by a hard check in training and had to quit practice prematurely, has lost some energy.
Your player %1% was late for practice today as he had some travel issues, as a result his energy level has taken a hit due to a lack of conditioning.
Your player %1% has a hangover today after a night of drinking and partying, his energy level has dropped as a result.
Your player %1% got in a fight at a local bar last night and as a result is a little beat up, his energy level has taken a hit as well.
Your player %1% overworked himself working out in the weight room and has lost some energy.
Your player %1% has been feeling the effects of stress and had recent sleepless nights, which he has.
Your player %1% has been eating a lot of fast food and junk food of late which has hurt his energy levels,
Your player %1% has been seeing positive results form his weight training regimen and as a result his form has seen an improvement.
Your player %1% has been feeling the effects if muscle stiffness and has cut back on his weight training to recouperate, as a result his form has seen a drop.
